pr_title: Process list if it is not empty

timeline.message: Process list if it is not empty

timeline.bodyText: Since outcomes is non-null already, isn't it better to remove if condition completely and use while(!outComes.isEmpty()) {..} loop instead of do {..} while (!outComes.isEmpty());?
timeline.author: mdogan

replies.bodyText: thx, fixed for both primary and backup operations.
replies.author: ahmetmircik
